personalInfo.name: Passakorn Limseng
personalInfo.title: Computer Engineering Student & Full-Stack Developer
personalInfo.bio: Passionate Computer Engineering student specializing in interactive web applications with modern technologies. I love creating digital experiences that combine beautiful design with powerful functionality.
personalInfo.shortBio: Building the future, one line of code at a time.

about.introduction: Hello! I'm Passakorn, a passionate Computer Engineering student at Kasetsart University with a deep love for creating innovative digital solutions. My journey in technology began with curiosity and has evolved into a career dedicated to building exceptional user experiences through modern web technologies.

journey.title: Advanced Development & AI Integration
journey.description: Working on cutting-edge projects including AI-powered hospital systems and modern web applications with advanced animations and interactions.

journey.title: Full-Stack Expansion
journey.description: Expanded expertise in modern frameworks like SvelteKit, Next.js, and Flutter, while contributing to language learning platforms and mobile applications.

journey.title: Foundation Building
journey.description: Started with foundational technologies and gradually built expertise in full-stack development, focusing on user-centric design and performance.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Constantly exploring new technologies and approaches to solve complex problems.

values.title: User-Centric
values.description: Designing with empathy and focusing on creating meaningful user experiences.

values.title: Quality
values.description: Committed to writing clean, maintainable code and delivering polished products.

values.title: Learning
values.description: Always growing, learning new skills, and staying updated with industry trends.

stats.label: Dedication
stats.description: Commitment to excellence in every project

about.approach: I believe in combining technical excellence with creative problem-solving to build solutions that not only work well but also provide exceptional user experiences. My approach focuses on understanding user needs, implementing best practices, and continuously learning from each project.
